snippet: PRESSER--Rhoda. Friends of Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, Jerusalem, mourns the passing of Rhoda Presser, beloved mother of our esteemed and devoted board member Mitchell Presser. Our thoughts are with Mitchell, Lauren and the entire family at this difficult time. Ilan Kaufthal, Chairman Bathsheva Rifkin, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: PRESSER--Rhoda. Friends of Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, Jerusalem, mourns the passing of Rhoda Presser, beloved mother of our esteemed and devoted board member Mitchell Presser. Our thoughts are with Mitchell, Lauren and the entire family at this difficult time. Ilan Kaufthal, Chairman Bathsheva Rifkin, President 1/3
